title: Need help with lag issue
body: Okay so i'll play a couple games and my ping is fine and then eventually i get into a game and in the middle of it my ping spikes to 3000+ and stays like that for the rest of the game. I won't be able to move or do anything. I play on a brand new desktop so that isn't the problem. Has anyone else had this problem? Has anyone resolved it? Help please!

replies.body:
This seems like your network is running into some issues keeping a stable connection to the game server that you're playing on. Since it doesn't happen in every game, we may need to go pretty in depth to get to the bottom on your high ping. 

Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team should be able to give more context into what's happening.
